name: Moron
overview: Your objective is to teleport aboard the Moron spaceship, find the Three Pillars of Time and teleport back to Earth. To help you, your dead predecessor has scattered 9 replacement Oxygen cylinders and 9 replacement Batteries aboard the spaceship. You'll need to: Maintain your life support system Avoid tripping the Intruder Alarm Deal with the Moron's pets Then, if you find each Pillar of Time, you'll have to dispose of the Moron (who comes to claim it), in a novel and unusual way. Finally you'll need to compete your objective before the spaceship spirals out of its orbit and crashes onto the Earth. The Morons couldn't find the Pillars of Time... CAN YOU?
